sentences:
Algarrobo is a town and municipality in the province of Málaga , part of the autonomous community of Andalusia in southern Spain .
The municipality is situated in the coastal area of La Axarquía , 32 kilometers from the city of Málaga .
It is bordered on the north by the municipality of Arenas and Sayalonga , to the east and west by Vélez - Málaga and to the south by the Mediterranean Sea .
It is situated at an altitude of 86 meters .
The main center for the population is Algarrobo , a town of Arab architecture situated 3.5 kilometers from the coast .
Other towns in the municipality are Algarrobo Costa , Mezquitilla and Trayamar .
It has a population of approximately 5,000 residents .
Natives of the town are called Algarrobeños .
Its surface area is 9.73   km and has a density of 639.16 inhabitants / km .
